parameter.name: listId
parameter.description: ID of the list to which the member belongs.

parameter.name: emailUniqueId
parameter.description: The unique id for an email address.

parameter.name: listEmailId
parameter.description: The list email id (previously called web_id) for a list-member-info type call. this doesn't change when the email address changes.

parameter.name: emailType
parameter.description: Change the email type preference for the member

parameter.name: replaceInterests
parameter.description: Flag to determine whether we replace the interest groups with the updated groups provided, or we add the provided groups to the member's interest groups

parameter.name: newEmail
parameter.description: set this to change the email address. This is only respected on calls using update_existing or when passed to lists/update.

parameter.name: optinIp
parameter.description: Set the Opt-in IP field. Abusing this may cause your account to be suspended. We do validate this and it must not be a private IP address.

parameter.name: optinTime
parameter.description: Set the Opt-in Time field. Abusing this may cause your account to be suspended. We do validate this and it must be a valid date.

parameter.name: mcNotes
parameter.description: Array of structs for managing notes.

parameter.name: latitude
parameter.description: Use the specified latitude (longitude must exist for this to work).

parameter.name: longitude
parameter.description: Use the specified longitude (latitude must exist for this to work).

parameter.name: anything
parameter.description: If this (or any other key exists here) we'll try to use the optin ip.
